item.title: How to Livestream a (Technology Focused) Class
item.description: In BC times (Before Covid), I had often dreamed of setting up a semi-regular gathering with some nerd friends to make things. We'd all sit around, drink beer, eat trail mix, and bash things together with Arduinos and Raspberry Pis and servos and LEDs and what have you. And then March 2020 rolled around - getting together in person was suddenly pass√©, but with my day job sending us home for "
